item.title: Gratitude
item.description: If there’s one thing I’ve learnt from my time on this planet, it’s the value of community. I am fortunate to be in the position that I am in today due of the many contributions, both large and small, given by theÂ countless people who have helped me along this journey. It truly does take a village, and I’d be remiss not to express my gratitude for the people who have made up mine by naming a few of them here.
